name: the test update
summary: Introduced major UI enhancements, new API endpoints, and performance optimizations.

new_features.title: Customizable Dashboard
new_features.description: Users can now add, remove, and rearrange widgets on the main dashboard.

new_features.title: New Analytics API
new_features.description: Introduced REST API for accessing real-time analytics data.

improvements.title: Performance Boost
improvements.description: Optimized database queries and reduced UI load times.

improvements.title: UI Polish
improvements.description: Refined typography, spacing, and animations for smoother transitions.
